title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7425.2 - Supervision of residents exercising their religious beliefs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7425.2 - Supervision of residents exercising their religious beliefs

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of Part 7404 of this

Title, each OCFS secure facility shall maintain adequate supervision during the
exercise of religious beliefs by residents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7425.2

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
